  • public class RocketLauncher
extends WeaponCard
    Represents the weapon card Rocket launcher.
    Author:
    Giuseppe Italia

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void basicEffect(Player player, Square position)
      Assigns two damage to the player passed by parameter and then if tha parameter position is not null moves him on that square.

      Moves the owner of the card in the square passed by parameter.

      Handles the attack of a weapon card.
      private void withFragmentingWarhead(Player player, Square square)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RocketLauncher

        public RocketLauncher()
        Constructor that calls the super constructor to initializes color and name. Then initializes the description, the list of the names of the effects with the relative single descriptions. Sets the price to buy the weapon and to reload it. At the end initializes the array of boolean that shows what kind of effect the weapon has.

    • Method Detail

      • useWeapon

        public void useWeapon(int typeOfAttack,
                      java.util.ArrayList<InvolvedPlayer> involvedPlayers)
        Description copied from class: WeaponCard
        Handles the attack of a weapon card. Through a switch of if-else statement and according with the typeOfAttack calls the relative method of a weapon to complete the attack chosen by the player. Sometimes the switch statement is not required, for example when the weapon has only one effect.
        Specified by:
        useWeapon in class WeaponCard
        Parameters:
        typeOfAttack - Number of the effect of the weapon to use.
        involvedPlayers - List of object that contains player or/and square involved in the attack.

      • withFragmentingWarhead

        private void withFragmentingWarhead(Player player,
                                    Square square)
        Assigns a damage to every player in the square passed by parameter and to the player passed by parameter if he is not on the previous square.

      • rocketJump

        private void rocketJump(Square square)
        Moves the owner of the card in the square passed by parameter.

      • basicEffect

        private void basicEffect(Player player,
                         Square position)
        Assigns two damage to the player passed by parameter and then if tha parameter position is not null moves him on that square.
